body:
When a camera was something that took several minutes to set up by a person trained to use it, there was basically zero chance of catching the opportunistic retard jogger in the course of him raping a white woman to death, but a very good chance of snapping a photo of the EVIL LYNCH MOB WHO EVILLY LYNCHED A POOR BLACK YOUTH while totally ignoring the jogger murdering and raping someone.

But now that joggers literally have videocameras built into their own phones and can livestream their own rapes and murders - which they do because they're evil, and lack the brain-parts to tell them that livestreaming your murder-rapes is bad - that's a harder lie to tell, and things are at least slowly and slightly shifting back to sane, intelligent racism again.

I don't know if it will be enough to overcome the coordination advantages that twitter offers to the stupid and morally bankrupt, or that the tide will turn before we're all rounded up and put into death camps, but still, at least it's something.

But now that joggers literally have videocameras built into their own phones and can livestream their own rapes and murders - which they do because they're evil, and lack the brain-parts to tell them that livestreaming your murder-rapes is bad - that's a harder lie to tell, and things are at least slowly and slightly shifting back to sane, intelligent racism again.

I don't know if it will be enough to overcome the coordination advantages that twitter offers to the stupid and morally bankrupt, or that the tide will turn before we're all rounded up and put into death camps, but still, at least it's something.
title: One reason I think jews were so successful in brainwashing generations of Americans is that the early state of film/photography was more suited to the lies they wanted to tell
